job_details.Vacaturetitel: Full Stack Software Engineer - CRM Developer
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Technical Development for CRM Solutions: Develop and refine our Retention Solutions and Products portfolio, utilising advanced resources such as API integrations, Braze technologies, and Google Cloud functions. You'll be responsible for developing solutions like GenAI Copywriting Assistant, Dynamic Content Campaigns, Automated Campaign Composer and Sender.
     * In-Braze Implementation: Continue the technical development by implementing Dynamic Content campaigns using automation and data languages like JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Liquid. Utilise App Scripts and Product APIs to enhance the functionality and efficiency of our CRM solutions.
     * Innovation & Solution Execution: Engage stakeholders to understand business needs and design innovative technical solutions. Oversee the development, launch, and evaluation of CRM campaign capabilities, ensuring alignment with company and Marketing/Product goals. Provide crucial technological inputs and collaborate with various teams to ensure solution feasibility and alignment.
     * Product Partnership: Work closely with the Product team to ensure seamless integration and maintenance of the Braze SDK. A key priority is to reduce silos between departments and align technologies.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Software Engineer - CRM Developer

* Technical Development for CRM Solutions: Develop and refine our Retention Solutions and Products portfolio, utilising advanced resources such as API integrations, Braze technologies, and Google Cloud functions. You'll be responsible for developing solutions like GenAI Copywriting Assistant, Dynamic Content Campaigns, Automated Campaign Composer and Sender.
     * In-Braze Implementation: Continue the technical development by implementing Dynamic Content campaigns using automation and data languages like JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Liquid. Utilise App Scripts and Product APIs to enhance the functionality and efficiency of our CRM solutions.
     * Innovation & Solution Execution: Engage stakeholders to understand business needs and design innovative technical solutions. Oversee the development, launch, and evaluation of CRM campaign capabilities, ensuring alignment with company and Marketing/Product goals. Provide crucial technological inputs and collaborate with various teams to ensure solution feasibility and alignment.
     * Product Partnership: Work closely with the Product team to ensure seamless integration and maintenance of the Braze SDK. A key priority is to reduce silos between departments and align technologies.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on CRM development, marketing automation, and traditional full-stack software engineering tasks. While it mentions 'GenAI Copywriting Assistant', this appears to be an application of AI tools rather than core development of generative models or AI systems. The primary responsibilities and technologies listed do not align with the core tasks of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Engage stakeholders to understand business needs
ensuring alignment with company and Marketing/Product goals
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand business requirements, connect technical work to business objectives, and ensure alignment across different departments and goals.

phrases: Develop and refine our Retention Solutions and Products portfolio
developing solutions like GenAI Copywriting Assistant, Dynamic Content Campaigns, Automated Campaign Composer and Sender
Continue the technical development by implementing Dynamic Content campaigns
Utilise App Scripts and Product APIs to enhance the functionality and efficiency of our CRM solutions
Oversee the development, launch, and evaluation of CRM campaign capabilities
collaborate with various teams to ensure solution feasibility
ensure seamless integration and maintenance of the Braze SDK
job_tasks.justification: This category covers the core software engineering activities described, including developing solutions, integrating APIs, using cloud functions, building campaign capabilities, and ensuring system integration.

technologies.justification: While not a specific library, 'GenAI Copywriting Assistant' implies the use of generative AI capabilities, likely leveraging LLM frameworks.
App Scripts are often used for automation and integration tasks, which can overlap with data pipeline and operational scripting.
Liquid is a templating language often used in e-commerce and marketing platforms for dynamic content generation, which involves data processing and presentation.

phrases: Oversee the development, launch, and evaluation
take full responsibility for the quality and success of one's work
